definition[0]: the set of ideas and moral attitudes that are typical of a particular group
example[0]: a community in which people lived according to an ethos of sharing and caring
definition[1]: the set of ideas, aims, and moral attitudes belonging to the members of an organization
example[1]: Getting a bit of the American ethos into the business has been a good thing.
example[2]: The company ethos is to value part-time workers as much as full-time staff.
